value.title: Make a Table Visualization to Display All Observations from Data Source in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this session, I‚Äôm demonstrating how we can show all the records even if it is the same as the Power BI table. We all know that the Power BI table visual automatically removes the duplicate rows from end-users in the table. But sometimes we need to show the end-users all the values from the data source

value.title: New way to compare Date and DateTime Value in Power BI - August 2021 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to one more new update from Power BI Desktop. Sometimes we need to compare date or DateTime value in our DAX expression. At that time, we are using Date() function and Time() function. Now, there's one more easy way to compare Date and Time value in Power BI which is using "dt" keyword before

value.title: Power BI Tip - Hide Filter Pane From the Published Version of Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can hide the Filter Pane from the published version of the Power BI report. Sometimes there are situations in which we have set our Visual, Page or Report level filter as a part of development logic and we wish that end user should not able to change those values.

value.title: Power BI Tip - Stop Visual Interactions at Report Level in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can stop the interaction between the visualization. In Power BI, whenever we select any visual data point, it filters other visuals based on the selected data point. Sometimes there is a requirement, where we don‚Äôt need the filtering functionality on selected data

value.title: Sort Legend in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI Tips and Tricks Video. This is a short and sweet video demonstrating the functionality to apply Sort on Legend values in Power BI. We can now adjust the sort direction for items in our legends! This will also help to reorder some of the data in visuals like stacked column charts,

value.title: Use Page Navigation Action for Button to Navigate from One Page to Another in Power BI Report

value.title: 5 ways to get Power BI Support #pbifamily
value.excerpt: Sometimes you need Power BI support. Even if you know a lot about Power BI, everyone has a brain fart from time to time. Adam looks at 5 different ways you can get Power BI support to get you past your hurdle.  Community Site: https://community.powerbi.com Twitter Hashtag: #PowerBI and #pbihelp Facebook
